alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:35PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Glenn County through 615 PM PDT... At 535 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alder Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alder Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County
